name: Forbidden Punch
description:
Prepare your eggs for a deadly fight.
The day has come when justice will prevail and
all the Chads of the planet will fall on their knees in front of your fist.
When the outcome of the battle decides the fate - forbidden punches
does not exist!
* A unique story with two alternative and two main endings.
* Ability to play with friends on the same screen with a keyboard or gamepad.
* More than 10 playable characters.
* Atmospheric locations.
* Nice music.
